skills.title: Professional Skills:
list: Knowledge of HTML5/CSS3 and website administration;
Experience with HTML preprocessor such as Pug;
Experience with CSS preprocessors such as SASS, LESS, Stylus;
Experience with bundling tools such as Babel, Webpack, Grunt and Gulp;
Understanding CSS Writing Methodologies such as  OOCSS, BEM, ACSS, SMACSS;
Experience working with CMS and building/administering content in multiple CMS environments;
Fundamental knowledge on concepts and best practices of SEO;
Advanced knowledge of technical, usability and content-related aspects of a website and their impact on natural search visibility;
Strong proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Corel Draw Pro, Figma.
